biography.value:
An ogre chain brute wields a great spiked chain, swinging it with both hands in a wide circle to knock foes their feet. Alternatively, the ogre can swing the chain in a crushing overhead smash.

Ogres of War

Ogres love to rush headlong into battle, but with enough time and patience, some of them learn to carry out specialized missions. The names they are given—the ogre battering ram;battering ram, the ogre bolt launcher;bolt launcher, the chain brute, and the ogre howdah;howdah—reflect their particular functions. These jobs are tailored to take advantage of an ogre’s strengths.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value: This crude armor consists of thick furs and pelts.

Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d4 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage, and the target must succeed on a [[/save con 14 format=long]] or be &Reference[stunned]{stunned} for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw if it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The ogre swings its chain, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a [[/save dex 14 format=long]]. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes [[/damage 1d8 + 4 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and is knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn’t knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
